meanings.definition: A card game played by one person.
meanings.sent1: During his break, John enjoys playing solitaire on his computer.
meanings.sent2: She passed the time on the train by playing solitaire on her phone.
meanings.sent3: The solitaire game on his phone always helps him relax after a long day.
meanings.sent4: In the quiet of the night, the cards in the solitaire game seemed to whisper secrets.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the cards shuffling in the solitaire game was oddly soothing.

meanings.definition: A single gem set in a piece of jewelry.
meanings.sent1: Her engagement ring featured a beautiful solitaire diamond.
meanings.sent2: The necklace sparkled with a stunning solitaire gem at its center.
meanings.sent3: She felt like a queen wearing the solitaire pendant to the ball.
meanings.sent4: The solitaire gem on her finger seemed to hold all the light in the room.
meanings.sent5: The solitaire stone in the bracelet glinted like a tiny star.

meanings.definition: A type of diamond cut with a single stone.
meanings.sent1: The solitaire diamond in her ring was breathtakingly clear.
meanings.sent2: He carefully selected a solitaire diamond for the engagement ring.
meanings.sent3: The solitaire cut of the diamond made it stand out among the others.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes widened in awe at the brilliance of the solitaire diamond.
meanings.sent5: The solitaire diamond seemed to hold the entire spectrum of colors within its facets.
